content.a: This Easinet page explains what Metadata Catalogue does.
Easimap provides a simple, easy to use map interface to find, view and query geographic information. It is available to every member of staff.
We only record metadata for datasets in Metadata Catalogue. This document is to help you determine whether your information needs a record.
The GeoNetwork User Manual v2.10.3. The manual is a guide describing how to use the metadata catalog.
data.gov.uk is a UK Government project to make available non-personal UK government data as open data. Metadata for our open data are on here.
Version 2.2 of UK GEMINI2 metadata standard.
